name: Pink Flamingo
description: Known for creative and unusual pizzas, Pink Flamingo offers a hip atmosphere and their famous Hawaiian-style pizza with fresh pineapple.

name: Pink Flamingo Marais
description: Hip pizzeria with unique delivery service using pink balloons. Features organic ingredients and creative Hawaiian variations.

name: Pink Flamingo Montmartre
specialty: Hawaiian with serrano ham and figs
description: Montmartre location of the famous Pink Flamingo chain, known for gourmet Hawaiian pizza variations with premium ingredients.

name: Tony's Pizza Napoletana
description: Award-winning pizzeria by 13-time World Pizza Champion Tony Gemignani, offering multiple pizza styles including Hawaiian.

name: Zachary's Chicago Pizza
specialty: Deep-dish Hawaiian (ham, pineapple, thick cheese layer)
description: Employee-owned Bay Area institution famous for deep-dish pizza with over 225 'Best Pizza' awards, serving Hawaiian style since 1983.

name: Zachary's Chicago Pizza Oakland
description: Original Zachary's location offering their famous stuffed-crust Hawaiian pizza with premium ham and fresh pineapple.

name: Little Star Pizza
description: Chicago-style deep dish pizzeria known for their rich, thick-crust Hawaiian pizza with quality ingredients.

description: Global pizza chain's flagship location serving their classic Hawaiian pizza with ham and pineapple.

name: Pizza Hut Leicester Square
description: International pizza chain's central London location serving traditional Hawaiian pizza.

name: Pizza Union Spitalfields
description: Fire-baked Roman style pizzeria offering thin and crispy 12-inch Hawaiian pizzas.

name: London Pizza Depot
description: Local London chain celebrating the much-loved ham and pineapple combination on their Hawaiian Hula pizza.

name: Papa John's Honolulu
description: Papa John's Hawaii location offering both traditional Hawaiian and unique Hawaiian BBQ chicken variations.

name: Domino's Pizza Hawaii Kai
description: Hawaiian location of Domino's featuring locally-sourced pineapple on their Hawaiian pizza, staying true to the islands.

name: Pizza Marumo
description: Tokyo's renowned pizzeria offering a Japanese twist on Hawaiian pizza with teriyaki flavors and premium ingredients.

name: The Pizza Bar on 38th
specialty: Tokyo Hawaiian (ham, pineapple, Japanese cheese blend)
description: Award-winning Tokyo pizzeria ranked #3 globally, offering their take on Hawaiian pizza with Japanese cheese blends.

name: Pizza Roma Centro
description: Traditional Roman pizzeria offering their Italian interpretation of Hawaiian pizza with prosciutto and fresh pineapple.

name: 180g Pizzeria Romana

description: Modern Roman pizzeria featuring a gourmet version of Hawaiian pizza with premium San Daniele ham and caramelized pineapple.

name: Una Pizza Napoletana
description: World's #1 ranked pizzeria (2024) occasionally offers a refined Hawaiian pizza using the finest Italian ingredients.

name: L'industrie Pizzeria
specialty: Gourmet Hawaiian (prosciutto di Parma, roasted pineapple)
description: Brooklyn's acclaimed pizzeria offering an upscale version of Hawaiian pizza with premium Italian prosciutto.

name: Joe's Pizza
description: Iconic NYC pizza joint serving traditional Hawaiian slices with ham and pineapple on their famous thin crust.

name: Lou Malnati's
description: Chicago's legendary deep-dish institution offering thick-crust Hawaiian pizza with their signature buttery crust and chunky tomato sauce.

name: Giordano's
description: Famous Chicago pizzeria known for stuffed pizza, featuring Hawaiian with double crust and generous ham and pineapple filling.

name: Cicis Pizza
description: All-you-can-eat pizza buffet chain featuring their Hawaiian specialty with garlic butter crust, marinara, ham, and sweet pineapple.

name: California Pizza Kitchen
address: 207 S Beverly Dr, Beverly Hills, CA 90212
description: California-style pizza restaurant offering a unique twist on Hawaiian with BBQ chicken, pineapple, and red onions.

name: Blaze Pizza
description: Fast-casual pizza chain allowing custom Hawaiian pizzas with choice of ham or Canadian bacon and fresh pineapple.

name: Gino's East
description: Chicago deep-dish pioneer offering Hawaiian pizza in their signature corn meal crust with extra cheese and chunky sauce.

name: Prince Street Pizza
description: Famous for thick Sicilian-style squares, offering Hawaiian with ham and pineapple on their signature airy, focaccia-like crust.

name: Napoletana Pizza
description: Sydney pizzeria serving the popular Australian version of Hawaiian pizza with both ham and bacon plus pineapple.

name: Domino's Australia
description: Domino's Australia where Hawaiian pizza ranks among the top 4 most popular, serving over 5.7 million Hawaiian pizzas annually.

name: Hell Pizza
description: New Zealand pizza chain with a twist on Hawaiian, adding jalapeños for heat alongside traditional ham and pineapple.

name: Pizza Express
description: British pizza chain offering their version of Hawaiian pizza alongside their Italian-inspired menu.

name: Da Michele
description: Historic Neapolitan pizzeria, occasionally offering pineapple pizza as a modern interpretation while maintaining traditional methods.

name: Pizzarium
description: Gabriele Bonci's famous pizza al taglio spot occasionally features gourmet Hawaiian variations using premium ingredients.

name: Franco Manca
description: British sourdough pizza chain that occasionally offers Hawaiian variations using their signature slow-fermented dough.

name: Rossopomodoro
description: Neapolitan pizza chain offering their Italian take on Hawaiian pizza with buffalo mozzarella and San Marzano tomatoes.

name: Peter Piper Pizza
description: Family entertainment pizza chain featuring Hawaiian Luau pizza as part of their buffet and menu offerings.

name: Casey's General Store
description: Midwest convenience store chain famous for pizza, offering unique breakfast Hawaiian with ham, pineapple, and eggs.

name: Satellite Restaurant
address: Historical location - 539 Keil Dr, Chatham, ON N7M 3G1
description: The birthplace of Hawaiian pizza where Sam Panopoulos first created the ham and pineapple combination in 1962.

name: Standard Serious Pizza
specialty: Neapolitan Hawaiian (seasonal offering with prosciutto and pineapple)

description: Second location of Berlin's renowned Neapolitan pizzeria, featuring gas-fired oven pizzas with cold-fermented dough and premium toppings including Hawaiian variations.

name: Magic John's Pizza
specialty: New York Style Hawaiian (large thin crust with ham and pineapple)
description: Berlin's first authentic New York slice shop, serving big apple-style thin crust Hawaiian pizza by the slice or whole pie, founded by Brooklyn expat John.

specialty: Detroit Style Hawaiian (thick crust with caramelized cheese)
description: Second location of Magic John's featuring Detroit-style deep dish Hawaiian pizza with caramelized cheese crusts and generous toppings.

name: Mangiare Berlin
specialty: Sardinian-Style Hawaiian (with Italian ham and fresh pineapple)
description: Authentic Neapolitan pizzeria in historic Arminius market hall, run by Sardinian chefs using ingredients imported from Italy, offering their take on Hawaiian pizza.

name: Domino's Pizza Berlin
description: International pizza chain with numerous Berlin locations serving their classic Hawaiian pizza, popular in Germany since Hawaiian pizza is linked to Toast Hawaii tradition.

name: Pizzeria Da Sergio
description: Historic pizzeria in Rovinj's old town, famous for authentic Italian thin-crust pizzas. Known as one of the best pizzerias in Croatia with excellent Hawaiian variations.

name: Zita Pizza Napoletana
description: Authentic Neapolitan pizzeria using organic and sustainable local products, offering their take on Hawaiian pizza with premium Italian ingredients.

name: Pizzeria Orlando
description: Family-run pizzeria outside old town serving excellent Italian-style pizzas with Croatian touches, known for fresh ingredients and welcoming atmosphere.

name: Pizzeria Stari Grad
description: Located in the heart of Rovinj's old town, serving traditional Italian cuisine including classic Hawaiian pizza with fresh, simple ingredients.

name: Al Quadrato Pizzeria
description: Pizzeria owned by Umbrian pizzamaker offering authentic Italian pizzas made with imported Italian products, including their version of Hawaiian pizza.

name: Pizzeria Via Mercanti
description: Award-winning family pizzeria in historic Kensington Market, recognized as one of Toronto's top pizzerias. Features authentic Neapolitan wood-fired pizzas with gourmet Hawaiian variations.

name: Pizzeria Via Mercanti Elm Street
specialty: Gourmet Two-Layer Hawaiian (ricotta, prosciutto, pineapple, topped with margherita)

name: Pizzeria Via Mercanti Avenue
specialty: Artisan Hawaiian with San Marzano tomatoes
description: Third location of the acclaimed Via Mercanti family, offering refined Neapolitan pizzas with premium ingredients and sophisticated Hawaiian interpretations.

name: Famoso Neapolitan Pizzeria Calgary

specialty: Authentic Neapolitan Hawaiian (Italian ham, crushed pineapple, fior-di-latte)

name: Famoso Neapolitan Pizzeria Vancouver
specialty: West Coast Hawaiian (organic pineapple, prosciutto, local cheese)
description: Sophisticated pizzeria on vibrant Commercial Drive, featuring authentic Neapolitan pizzas with Pacific Northwest ingredients and innovative Hawaiian combinations.

name: Ignite Pizzeria
description: Modern Vancouver pizzeria stone-firing pizzas at 800 degrees. Known for handmade dough, premium ingredients, and creative Hawaiian variations with local BC products.

name: Blondies Pizza
description: Toronto's favorite gourmet pizzeria featuring thick crust pizzas made with hand-stretched dough and premium quality ingredients, including elevated Hawaiian options.

name: Pizzeria Badiali
specialty: New York Style Hawaiian (carefully sourced ingredients)
description: Neighborhood slice shop in Toronto's West End, serving classic New York-style pizza with carefully sourced and house-made ingredients, including artisanal Hawaiian variations.

name: Elena Restaurant
specialty: Upscale Hawaiian (blue cheese, pear, premium ham)
description: Chic Montreal restaurant known for sophisticated pizza combinations including innovative Hawaiian variations with gourmet ingredients like blue cheese and pear.

name: Boston Pizza
description: Canada's largest casual dining brand, serving their popular Hawaiian pizza made with Canadian bacon and pineapple across 350+ locations nationwide.
